snippet: The continuing violence highlights the challenges that face the country after a yearlong political turmoil resulted in a security vacuum and gave Al Qaeda the opportunity to seize several towns in the south.
lead_paragraph: The continuing violence highlights the challenges that face the country after a yearlong political turmoil resulted in a security vacuum and gave Al Qaeda the opportunity to seize several towns in the south.

headline.seo: Suicide Bombers Kill Soldier at Army Camp in Yemen
headline.main: Suicide Bombers Kill Soldier at Army Camp in Yemen
headline.print_headline: Suicide Bombers Kill Soldier at Army Camp in Yemen
